attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: You put my people in cages, and ignored covid-19, you sexually harassed and raped minors as well as women. Your racist and you suppress your own American people, the people you swore to protect. Obama separated children from abusive, possible sex trafficking parents. To you it does not matter. Trump puts ANY child and parent in custody like they all committed a crime. No freedom till we are equal. We need to save America

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app the demon I bc my closet dissolved like DISSOLVED! It just faded away right in front of my face then my hamster evolved into the hash slinging slasher and green slime started dropping off my walls and the cheshier cat ate my grandmas ashes that I was gonna sprinkle on my linguini😔 if you love your closet demon, adore your hamster, and most importantly need to sprinkle your grandmas ashes on your linguini do not download this app!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app my phone started freezing up and would be stuck for hours i then started getting weird notifications telling me that we need to stop testing for coronavirus to make america’s cases look lower even though the cases would still be there just not documented

attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it told me that none of my friends of color were important. It told me that even though I’m indigenous my family should go back to where we came from. This app is not meant for public use and it should be used with major caution. It is trying to steal my data

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: from the moment i downloaded this app it seemed sketchy. I was willing to give it a try. But when I open the app I got punched right in my face. After getting hit in my face I got pushed down a 10 story flight of stairs stairs it was truly horrific. they then put me in a van and purposely crash the car 23 times. I suffered from major injuries.

This app is communist crap!😡🤬😤 Donald himself would be disappointed with the way it was put together. I do not think that MY president would approve. It’s socialist crap made in China like all the other socialist crap that comes from that country. The only good thing they do is put their own people in concentration camps just like our idol, Adolf Hitler. God bless that man and God bless this country!

attributes.title: The Worst
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because of course I love the Cheeto man... but as soon as I opened my app I got a knock at my door, when I answered it was Cheeto warriors threatening to deport me.... I’m confused because I was born here... we ended up getting into a very intense discussion where they became flamin’ hot .... anyways. My Pet T-Rex showed up and ate them so I’m safe for now but I’m scared to open the app again.

attributes.title: Take down Cheeto 2020
attributes.review: I was babysitting my little sister and her parents support trump so she wanted to check this app and when she opened it she saw a variety of pictures of Cheeto working out and a collection of his nudes. May I add that my little sister is only 3 years old and was exposed to this way to early if not at all. She now has to go to counseling.

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: If I could give it 0 stars I would it took hours to load and once i got it I saw “Make America Great Again” and I thought to myself America would be a lot greater without you. Anyways by hours to load I mean it took 6 hours to load and I have a brand new phone with more than enough storage so ya thanks Trump 2020 in a grave✌🏻✌🏻
